response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this item for $950,000. This exceptional piece represents a significant investment and a chance to own something truly remarkable. I believe its worth far exceeds this amount, but I am willing to negotiate if you find it within your budget or interests. Please let me know your thoughts on this offer. I look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
